trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: Incapsula un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: Application is a class that encapsulates [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] application-specific functionality, including the following: - **Application Lifetime**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.Activated>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Deactivated>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.DispatcherUnhandledException>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup>.
trans-unit.target: Applicazione è una classe che incapsula [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] funzionalità specifiche dell'applicazione, inclusi i seguenti:- **durata applicazione**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.Activated>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Current%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.Deactivated>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.DispatcherUnhandledException> <xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup> </xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit> </xref:System.Windows.Application.DispatcherUnhandledException> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Deactivated> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Activated>

trans-unit.source: - **Application-Scope Window, Property, and Resource Management**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.FindResource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.GetContentStream%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.GetResourceStream%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadComponent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Properties%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - **Applicazione finestra proprietà e la gestione delle risorse**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.FindResource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.GetContentStream%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.GetResourceStream%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadComponent%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Properties%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Properties%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadComponent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.GetResourceStream%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.GetContentStream%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.FindResource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - **Command-Line Parameter and Exit Code Processing**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - **Parametro della riga di comando e codice di uscita elaborazione**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - **Navigation**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.FragmentNavigation>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadCompleted>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigated>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.SetCookie%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.GetCookie%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - **Navigation**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.FragmentNavigation>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadCompleted>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigated>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.SetCookie%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.GetCookie%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.GetCookie%2A></xref:System.Windows.Application.SetCookie%2A></xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed></xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped></xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress></xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating></xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigated></xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadCompleted></xref:System.Windows.Application.FragmentNavigation>

trans-unit.source: Application implements the singleton pattern to provide shared access to its window, property, and resource scope services.
trans-unit.target: Applicazione implementa il pattern singleton per fornire accesso condiviso per la finestra, una proprietà e servizi nell'ambito di risorsa.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, only one instance of the Application class can be created per <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: Di conseguenza, può essere creata solo un'istanza della classe di applicazione per <xref:System.AppDomain>.</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: You can implement an Application using markup, markup and code-behind, or code.
trans-unit.target: È possibile implementare un'applicazione tramite markup, markup e code-behind o codice.

trans-unit.source: If Application is implemented with markup, whether markup or markup and code-behind, the markup file must be configured as an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_msbuild](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-msbuild-md.md)] `ApplicationDefinition` item.
trans-unit.target: Se l'applicazione viene implementata con markup, se markup o markup e code-behind, il file di markup deve essere configurato come un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_msbuild](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-msbuild-md.md)] `ApplicationDefinition` elemento.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A standalone application does not require an Application object; it is possible to implement a custom `static` entry point method (`Main`) that opens a window without creating an instance of Application.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Un'applicazione autonoma non richiede un oggetto applicazione, è possibile implementare una classe personalizzata `static` metodo punto di ingresso (`Main`) che consente di aprire una finestra senza creare un'istanza dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: However, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] require an Application object.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] richiedono un oggetto applicazione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Application"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Application"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Only one instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Application> class can be created per <xref:System.AppDomain>, to ensure shared access to a single set of application-scope window, property, and resource data.
trans-unit.target: Solo un'istanza di <xref:System.Windows.Application>classe può essere creata per ogni <xref:System.AppDomain>, per garantire l'accesso condiviso a un singolo set di dati nella finestra proprietà e risorse dell'ambito di applicazione.</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, the default constructor of the <xref:System.Windows.Application> class detects whether the instance being initialized is the first instance in an <xref:System.AppDomain>; if it is not, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Di conseguenza, il costruttore predefinito del <xref:System.Windows.Application>classe rileva se l'istanza da inizializzare è la prima istanza in un <xref:System.AppDomain>; in caso contrario, un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>viene generata un'eccezione.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Application> object for the current <xref:System.AppDomain> is exposed from the static <xref:System.Windows.Application.Current%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Application>oggetto per l'oggetto corrente <xref:System.AppDomain>è esposto dal statica <xref:System.Windows.Application.Current%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Current%2A> </xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: More than one instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Application"></xref> class is created per <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Più di un'istanza del <xref href="System.Windows.Application"> </xref> creata per ogni classe <xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an application becomes the foreground application.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando un'applicazione diventa l'applicazione di primo piano.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] application that has one or more open windows is activated (becomes the foreground application) when one of the windows is activated for the first time since the application was launched, or when one of the windows is activated while the application is inactive: Specifically, activation occurs when: - An application opens its first window.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] è attivata l'applicazione che ha uno o più finestre aperte (diventa l'applicazione di primo piano) quando una delle finestre è attivata per la prima volta dopo l'applicazione è stata avviata o quando una delle finestre è attivata mentre l'applicazione è inattivo: in particolare, l'attivazione si verifica quando:-un'applicazione apre la prima finestra.

trans-unit.source: - A user switches to the application by using ALT+TAB or by using Task Manager.
trans-unit.target: -Un utente passa all'applicazione usando ALT + TAB o utilizzare Task Manager.

trans-unit.source: - A user clicks the taskbar button for one of the windows in an application.
trans-unit.target: -Un utente fa clic sul pulsante della barra delle applicazioni per una delle finestre in un'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: Applications that need to detect when they activate can handle the Activated event.
trans-unit.target: Le applicazioni necessarie per rilevare l'attivazione possono gestire l'evento attivato.

trans-unit.source: After an application is first activated, it may be deactivated and reactivated many times during its lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Dopo l'attivazione di un'applicazione, potrebbe disattivato e riattivato più volte durante la relativa durata.

trans-unit.source: If an application's behavior or state depends on its activation state, it can handle both Activated and <xref:System.Windows.Application.Deactivated> events to determine which activation state it's in.
trans-unit.target: Comportamento di un'applicazione o stato dipende dal relativo stato di attivazione, può gestire sia attivato e <xref:System.Windows.Application.Deactivated>gli eventi per determinare quali attivazione stato di cm</xref:System.Windows.Application.Deactivated>

trans-unit.source: Once an application becomes active, Activated will not be raised again until the application is deactivated, irrespective of how many windows within an application are activated while the application is active.
trans-unit.target: Dopo che un'applicazione diventa attiva, Activated verrà generato di nuovo fino a quando l'applicazione viene disattivata, indipendentemente dal numero di finestre in un'applicazione viene attivato durante l'applicazione è attiva.

trans-unit.source: Activated is not raised for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Attivazione non viene generato per [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Application"></xref> object for the current <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Application"> </xref> oggetto per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Application> is a per-<xref:System.AppDomain> singleton type that implements the static Current property to provide shared access to the <xref:System.Windows.Application> instance for the current <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Application>è una per ogni-<xref:System.AppDomain> tipo singleton che implementa la proprietà statica corrente per fornire accesso condiviso per l' <xref:System.Windows.Application>istanza corrente <xref:System.AppDomain>.</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.AppDomain></xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: This design guarantees that state managed by <xref:System.Windows.Application>, including shared resources and state, is available from a single, shared location.
trans-unit.target: Questa progettazione garantisce che lo stato gestito da <xref:System.Windows.Application>, incluse le risorse condivise e lo stato, è disponibile un unico percorso condiviso.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: This property is thread safe and is available from any thread.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è thread-safe ed è disponibile da qualsiasi thread.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Application"></xref> object for the current <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Application"> </xref> oggetto per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an application stops being the foreground application.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando un'applicazione non è più l'applicazione di primo piano.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] application that has one or more open windows deactivates (stops being the foreground application) when a user does the following: - Switches to another application by using ALT+TAB or by using Task Manager.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] applicazione che dispone di uno o più finestre aperte di viene disattivata (non è l'applicazione di primo piano) quando un utente esegue le operazioni seguenti:-passa a un'altra applicazione utilizzando ALT + TAB oppure tramite Gestione attività.

trans-unit.source: - Clicks the taskbar button for a window in another application.
trans-unit.target: -Fa clic sul pulsante della barra delle applicazioni per una finestra in un'altra applicazione.

trans-unit.source: Applications that need to detect deactivation can handle the Deactivated event.
trans-unit.target: Le applicazioni necessarie per rilevare la disattivazione possono gestire l'evento Deactivated.

trans-unit.source: After an application is first activated, it may be deactivated and reactivated many times during its lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Dopo l'attivazione di un'applicazione, potrebbe disattivato e riattivato più volte durante la relativa durata.

trans-unit.source: If an application's behavior or state depends on its activation state, it can handle both Deactivated and <xref:System.Windows.Application.Activated> events to determine which state it's in.
trans-unit.target: Comportamento di un'applicazione o stato dipende dal relativo stato di attivazione, può gestire sia Deactivated e <xref:System.Windows.Application.Activated>eventi per determinare quale stato è pollici</xref:System.Windows.Application.Activated>

trans-unit.source: Deactivated is not raised for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Disattivato non viene generato per [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an exception is thrown by an application but not handled.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando un'eccezione viene generata da un'applicazione non gestita.

trans-unit.source: By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] catches unhandled exceptions, notifies users of the exception from a dialog box (from which they can report the exception), and automatically shuts down an application.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] intercetta le eccezioni non gestite, notifica agli utenti di eccezione da una finestra di dialogo (da cui possono segnalare l'eccezione) e arresta automaticamente un'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: However, if an application needs to perform custom unhandled exception processing from a centralized location, you should handle DispatcherUnhandledException.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, se un'applicazione deve eseguire l'elaborazione da una posizione centralizzata personalizzata delle eccezioni non gestita, è necessario gestire DispatcherUnhandledException.

trans-unit.source: DispatcherUnhandledException is raised by an <xref:System.Windows.Application> for each exception that is unhandled by code running on the main UI thread.
trans-unit.target: DispatcherUnhandledException viene generato da un <xref:System.Windows.Application>per ogni eccezione gestita dal codice in esecuzione nel thread principale della UI.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is not handled on either a background [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread (a thread with its own <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>) or a background worker thread (a thread without a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>), the exception is not forwarded to the main [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread.
trans-unit.target: Se un'eccezione non gestita su uno sfondo [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread (un thread con il proprio <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>) o un thread di lavoro in background (un thread senza un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>), l'eccezione non viene inoltrato a principale [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, DispatcherUnhandledException is not raised.
trans-unit.target: Di conseguenza, non viene generato DispatcherUnhandledException.

trans-unit.source: In these circumstances, you will need to write code to do the following: 1.
trans-unit.target: In questi casi, è necessario scrivere codice per eseguire le operazioni seguenti: 1.

trans-unit.source: Handle exceptions on the background thread.
trans-unit.target: Gestione delle eccezioni nel thread in background.

trans-unit.source: Dispatch those exceptions to the main [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread.
trans-unit.target: Inviare queste eccezioni il principale [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread.

trans-unit.source: Rethrow them on the main [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread without handling them to allow DispatcherUnhandledException to be raised.
trans-unit.target: Rigenerarle sul principale [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread senza gestisce in modo da consentire DispatcherUnhandledException da generare.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Threading Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) overview.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere il [il modello di Threading](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) Panoramica.

trans-unit.source: The DispatcherUnhandledException event handler is passed a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs> argument that contains contextual information regarding the exception, including: - The exception (<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs.Exception%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Il gestore dell'evento DispatcherUnhandledException viene passato un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs>argomento che contiene le informazioni contestuali relative all'eccezione, tra cui:-l'eccezione (<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs.Exception%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> from which it originated (<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherEventArgs.Dispatcher%2A>).
trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>da cui ha origine (<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherEventArgs.Dispatcher%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherEventArgs.Dispatcher%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: You can use this information to determine whether an exception is recoverable or not.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare queste informazioni per determinare se un'eccezione è reversibile.

trans-unit.source: A recoverable exception might be a <xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>, for example, while an unrecoverable exception might be a <xref:System.StackOverflowException>, for example.
trans-unit.target: Un'eccezione reversibile potrebbe essere un <xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>, ad esempio, durante un'eccezione irreversibile potrebbe essere un <xref:System.StackOverflowException>, ad esempio.</xref:System.StackOverflowException> </xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>

trans-unit.source: When you process an unhandled exception from DispatcherUnhandledException, and you don't want [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to continue processing it, you need to set the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs.Handled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando si elabora un'eccezione non gestita da DispatcherUnhandledException e non si desidera [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] per continuare l'elaborazione, è necessario impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs.Handled%2A>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unlike the other events that <xref:System.Windows.Application> raises, DispatcherUnhandledException does not have a matching protected virtual implementation (OnDispatcherUnhandledException).
trans-unit.target: A differenza di altri eventi che <xref:System.Windows.Application>Genera, DispatcherUnhandledException non dispone di un'implementazione virtuale protetta corrispondente (OnDispatcherUnhandledException).</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, classes that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Application> must always register an event handler with DispatcherUnhandledException to process unhandled exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Di conseguenza, le classi che derivano da <xref:System.Windows.Application>devono sempre registrare un gestore eventi con DispatcherUnhandledException per elaborare le eccezioni non gestite.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs just before an application shuts down, and cannot be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica poco prima che un'applicazione viene chiuso e non può essere annullata.

trans-unit.source: An application can shut down for either of the following reasons: - The <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object is called, either explicitly or as determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione è possibile arrestare per uno dei seguenti motivi: - il <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Application>viene chiamato l'oggetto, in modo esplicito o come determinato dal <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The user ends the session by logging off or shutting down.
trans-unit.target: -L'utente termina la sessione mediante disconnessione o chiusura.

trans-unit.source: You can detect when application shutdown occurs by handling the Exit event, and perform any additional processing as required.
trans-unit.target: È possibile rilevare quando si verifica l'arresto dell'applicazione gestendo l'evento di uscita ed eseguire eventuali elaborazioni aggiuntive in base alle esigenze.

trans-unit.source: You can also handle Exit to inspect or change the application exit code when you don't need to call <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> explicitly.
trans-unit.target: È anche possibile gestire Esci per controllare o modificare il codice di uscita quando non è necessario chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>in modo esplicito.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>

trans-unit.source: The exit code is exposed from the <xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs.ApplicationExitCode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs> argument that's passed to the Exit event handler.
trans-unit.target: Il codice di uscita è esposto dal <xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs.ApplicationExitCode%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs>argomento passato al gestore dell'evento di uscita.</xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs.ApplicationExitCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the application stops running, the exit code is passed to the operating system for subsequent processing.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'applicazione si arresta, il codice di uscita viene passato al sistema operativo per l'elaborazione successiva.

trans-unit.source: If your application handles the <xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding> event and subsequently cancels it, Exit is not raised and the application continues running in accordance with the shutdown mode.
trans-unit.target: Se l'applicazione gestisce il <xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding>evento e successivamente Annulla non, uscita viene generato e l'applicazione continua l'esecuzione in base alla modalità di arresto.</xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding>

trans-unit.source: The exit code can be set from an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)], although the value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Il codice di uscita può essere impostato da un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)], anche se il valore viene ignorato.

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)], Exit is raised in the following circumstances: - An [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is navigated away from.
trans-unit.target: Per [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)], uscita viene generato nelle circostanze seguenti: - un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ci si sposta.

trans-unit.source: - In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], when the tab that is hosting the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is closed.
trans-unit.target: -In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], quando la scheda che ospita il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] è chiuso.

trans-unit.source: - When the browser is closed.
trans-unit.target: -Quando il browser viene chiuso.

trans-unit.source: In all cases, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs.ApplicationExitCode%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: In tutti i casi, il valore di <xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs.ApplicationExitCode%2A>proprietà viene ignorata.</xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs.ApplicationExitCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Searches for a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] resource, such as a <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref>, with the specified key, and throws an exception if the requested resource is not found (see [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).
trans-unit.target: Cerca un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] risorsa, ad esempio un <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref>, con la chiave specificata e genera un'eccezione se la risorsa richiesta non viene trovata (vedere [risorse XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).

trans-unit.source: FindResource will first look in application-scope resources for the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: Ricerca FindResource innanzitutto nelle risorse dell'ambito dell'applicazione per la risorsa specificata.

trans-unit.source: Application-scope resources are managed by <xref:System.Windows.Application>, and are exposed from the <xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Le risorse dell'ambito di applicazione sono gestite da <xref:System.Windows.Application>e vengono esposte dal <xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: If the specified resource is not found in the set of application-scope resources, FindResource then next searches the system resources.
trans-unit.target: Se la risorsa specificata non viene trovata nel set di risorse in ambito di applicazione, FindResource quindi la ricerca le risorse di sistema.

trans-unit.source: System resources are shell resources defined by the user, and include colors, fonts, and shell configurations.
trans-unit.target: Le risorse di sistema sono shell risorse definite dall'utente e includono i colori, tipi di carattere e le configurazioni della shell.

trans-unit.source: These are exposed from the <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors>, <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts>, and <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters> types, respectively, as static properties.
trans-unit.target: Questi sono esposti da di <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors>, <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts>, e <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters>tipi, rispettivamente, come proprietà statiche.</xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters> </xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts> </xref:System.Windows.SystemColors>

trans-unit.source: To use FindResource to acquire them, these types also expose resource key properties that are designed to be passed to FindResource; for example, <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IconWidthKey%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare FindResource per acquisirle, questi tipi espongono anche le proprietà chiave di risorsa sono progettate per essere passato a FindResource; ad esempio, <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IconWidthKey%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IconWidthKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because FindResource returns an object, you must cast the returned value to the appropriate type if the resource is found.
trans-unit.target: Poiché FindResource restituisce un oggetto, è necessario eseguire il cast del valore restituito nel tipo appropriato se la risorsa è stata trovata.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If you call this method for a key that cannot be found, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Se si chiama questo metodo per una chiave che non è stata trovata, viene generata un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to handle exceptions that result from calling FindResource, call <xref:System.Windows.Application.TryFindResource%2A> instead; <xref:System.Windows.Application.TryFindResource%2A> returns a `null` reference when a requested resource cannot be found, and does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera gestire le eccezioni generate da FindResource chiamante, chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Application.TryFindResource%2A>invece. <xref:System.Windows.Application.TryFindResource%2A>restituisce un `null` fare riferimento quando una risorsa richiesta non è stata trovata e non viene generata un'eccezione.</xref:System.Windows.Application.TryFindResource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.TryFindResource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is thread safe and can be called from any thread.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è thread-safe e possa essere chiamato da qualsiasi thread.

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource to find.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della risorsa da trovare.

trans-unit.source: The requested resource object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto risorsa richiesto.

trans-unit.source: If the requested resource is not found, a <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceReferenceKeyNotFoundException"></xref> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se la risorsa richiesta non viene trovata, un <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceReferenceKeyNotFoundException"> </xref> viene generata un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The resource cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: Impossibile trovare la risorsa.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a navigator in the application begins navigation to a content fragment, Navigation occurs immediately if the desired fragment is in the current content, or after the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] content has been loaded if the desired fragment is in different content.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando inizia la navigazione verso un frammento di contenuto, uno strumento di navigazione nell'applicazione di navigazione si verifica immediatamente se il frammento desiderato è il contenuto corrente, o dopo l'origine [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] contenuto è stato caricato, se il frammento desiderato è in un contenuto diverso.

trans-unit.source: A navigator is either a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: Uno strumento di spostamento è un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>o un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Vedere <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.target: Restituisce un flusso di risorsa per un file di dati di contenuto che si trova in corrispondenza <xref:System.Uri>(vedere [risorse dell'applicazione WPF, contenuto e i file di dati](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: This method is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non è thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: The relative <xref:System.Uri> that maps to a loose resource.
trans-unit.target: Relativo <xref:System.Uri>che esegue il mapping a una risorsa separata.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Resources.StreamResourceInfo"></xref> that contains a content data file that is located at the specified <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Resources.StreamResourceInfo"> </xref> che contiene un file di dati di contenuto che si trova all'indirizzo specificato <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: If a loose resource is not found, null is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se una risorsa separata non viene trovata, viene restituito null.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> that is passed to GetContentStream is null.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Uri>che viene passata a GetContentStream è null.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> that is passed to GetContentStream is an absolute <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Uri>che è passato a GetContentStream è assoluto <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri> </xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a cookie for the location specified by a <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: Recupera un cookie per il percorso specificato da un <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: GetCookie retrieves a cookie for the specified <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: GetCookie recupera un cookie per specificata <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: If the cookie can't be retrieved, a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se il cookie non può essere recuperato, un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception>viene generata un'eccezione.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception>

trans-unit.source: You need to write the code to parse the cookie string into a list of name/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: È necessario scrivere il codice per analizzare la stringa del cookie in un elenco di coppie nome/valore.

trans-unit.source: For an overview of cookies in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], see [Navigation Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per una panoramica dei cookie in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], vedere [Navigation Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> that specifies the location for which a cookie was created.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Uri>che specifica il percorso per cui è stato creato un cookie.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> value, if the cookie exists; otherwise, a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception"></xref> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>valore, se il cookie esiste; in caso contrario, un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception"> </xref> viene generata un'eccezione.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] error is raised by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_InternetGetCookie" name="InternetGetCookie" href=""></xref> function (called by GetCookie) if a problem occurs when attempting to retrieve the specified cookie.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] errore viene generato dal <xref uid="langword_csharp_InternetGetCookie" name="InternetGetCookie" href=""> </xref> funzione (chiamata da GetCookie) se si verifica un problema durante il tentativo di recuperare il cookie specificato.

trans-unit.source: Returns a resource stream for a site-of-origin data file that is located at the specified <xref:System.Uri> (see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when content that was navigated to by a navigator in the application has been loaded, parsed, and has begun rendering.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il contenuto che è stato aperto uno strumento di navigazione nell'applicazione è stato caricato, analizzato e sottoposto a rendering.

trans-unit.source: A navigator is either a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Listen for events on the navigated content such as the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>event on <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> before you access properties of the navigated content.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ascolto degli eventi sul contenuto, ad esempio il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>evento <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>prima accedere alle proprietà del contenuto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>

trans-unit.source: Loads a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] file that is located at the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)], and converts it to an instance of the object that is specified by the root element of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] file.
trans-unit.target: Carica un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] file che si trova in corrispondenza [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]e lo converte in un'istanza dell'oggetto specificato dall'elemento radice del [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] file.

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly convert the return value to the same type as the root element of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] file.
trans-unit.target: È necessario convertire in modo esplicito il valore restituito nello stesso tipo dell'elemento radice del [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] file.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] file can be an application code file (configured as an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_msbuild](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-msbuild-md.md)] Page item) or an application data file (a resource file, content file, or site-of-origin file; see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] file può essere un file di codice dell'applicazione (configurato come un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_msbuild](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-msbuild-md.md)] elemento Page) o un file di dati dell'applicazione (un file di risorse, i file di contenuto o del sito di origine del file; vedere [risorse dell'applicazione WPF, contenuto e i file di dati](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the main window of the application.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la finestra principale dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: MainWindow is automatically set with a reference to the first <xref:System.Windows.Window> object to be instantiated in the <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: Finestra principale viene impostato automaticamente con un riferimento al primo <xref:System.Windows.Window>oggetto da cui creare istanze di <xref:System.AppDomain>.</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: You can specify a different main window by setting MainWindow assigning another <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> object to the MainWindow property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile specificare un'altra finestra principale impostando l'assegnazione di un altro MainWindow <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>oggetto alla proprietà MainWindow.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object is set to <xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode>, closing the main window causes the application to shut down.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Application>è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode>, chiudendo la finestra principale causa l'arresto dell'applicazione.</xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode> </xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is possible to set the MainWindow property from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], if an application's main window is not the window that is produced by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A> property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: È possibile impostare la proprietà MainWindow [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], se la finestra principale di un'applicazione non è una finestra che viene generata mediante l'impostazione di <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>proprietà [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: The two limitations of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] approach are: - You can specify either a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-only <xref:System.Windows.Window> or a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-only <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> as the main window.
trans-unit.target: Le due limitazioni del [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] approccio sono:-è possibile specificare un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-solo <xref:System.Windows.Window>o un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-solo <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>come la finestra principale.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: - You must set the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A> property of the window you specify, otherwise it won't be shown.
trans-unit.target: -È necessario impostare il <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A>della finestra di questa proprietà viene specificata, in caso contrario non verrà visualizzata.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A>

trans-unit.source: The reference to the first <xref:System.Windows.Window> object to be instantiated is also added as the first item to the <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il riferimento al primo <xref:System.Windows.Window>oggetto deve essere creata un'istanza viene aggiunto anche come il primo elemento di <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>insieme.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: If MainWindow is subsequently set with a reference to a different <xref:System.Windows.Window>, the position of the item with the reference to the main window will change, while the order of items in <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> remains the same.
trans-unit.target: Se MainWindow successivamente viene impostato con un riferimento a un altro <xref:System.Windows.Window>, in cui verrà modificata la posizione dell'elemento con il riferimento alla finestra principale, mentre l'ordine degli elementi in <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>rimane invariato.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, always use MainWindow to refer to the main window instead of the first item in <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Di conseguenza, è possibile utilizzare sempre MainWindow per fare riferimento alla finestra principale anziché il primo elemento <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the main window is a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, and you need specific access to <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> members, you will need to cast the value of MainWindow to <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se la finestra principale è un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, ed è necessario l'accesso specifico ai <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>membri, sarà necessario eseguire il cast di MainWindow per <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: > > This property is available only from the thread that created the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: >> Questa proprietà è disponibile solo dal thread che ha creato il <xref:System.Windows.Application>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> that is designated as the main application window.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Window"> </xref> che è designato come finestra principale dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: MainWindow is set from an application that's hosted in a browser, such as an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Finestra principale è impostato da un'applicazione che è ospitata in un browser, ad esempio un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content that is being navigated to by a navigator in the application has been found, although it may not have completed loading.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il contenuto verso uno strumento di navigazione nell'applicazione è stato trovato, ma potrebbe non avere completato il caricamento.

trans-unit.target: Uno strumento di spostamento è un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>o un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>
